subject: Football
Fines (Penalties)
Super Bowl
lead_paragraph: Seattle Seahawks linebacker Bruce Irvin has been fined $10,000 by the N.F.L. for his role in a scuffle with 18 seconds left in the Super Bowl.
snippet: Seattle Seahawks linebacker Bruce Irvin has been fined $10,000 by the N.F.L. for his role in a scuffle with 18 seconds left in the Super Bowl.
